heading: HB01095
0: AN ACT SEPRATING THE TUBLAY SCHOOL OF HOME INDUSTRIES EXTENSION, IN THE BARANGAY TUBLAY CENTRAL, MUNICIPALITY OF TUBLAY, PROVINCE OF BENGUET FROM THE TUBLAY SCHOOL OF HOME INDUSTRIES MAIN, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS TUBLAY NATIONAL TRADE HIGH SCHOOL, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA10992 enacted on 2018-03-21 Substituted by HB04469
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01095
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SEPRATING THE TUBLAY SCHOOL OF HOME INDUSTRIES EXTENSION, IN THE BARANGAY TUBLAY CENTRAL, MUNICIPALITY OF TUBLAY, PROVINCE OF BENGUET FROM THE TUBLAY SCHOOL OF HOME INDUSTRIES MAIN, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS TUBLAY NATIONAL TRADE HIGH SCHOOL, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : COSALAN, RONALD M.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-05
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-30
          -Sent to the DepED for comment.
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2016-10-10
      3. Approved by the Committee on 2016-10-10
      4. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2016-10-10
      5. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2016-10-20
      6. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2016-10-20
          -Approved without amendment pursuant to Section 44 of the Rules of the House of Representatives, 17th Congress.
      7. Committee Report filed on 2016-11-17
          -Committee Report No. 23 for House Bill No. 4469, in substitution of House Bill No. 1095.
MOTHER BILL: HB04469
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2016-08-01
